name: Tears of the World Tree Pre-Alpha Release v0.02
name_original: Tears of the World Tree Pre-Alpha Release v0.02
description: “Tears of the World Tree” revolves around Yggdrasil and the different realms in its dominion. The realms are in chaos and you as a champion of Yggdrasil shall defend them from an unspoken evil. Together with your childhood friend Honoka, the Goddess Galadriel, and Sylvania, travel the vastness of the cosmos in search of people worthy to become heroes to aide you on your quest and uncover a dark secret hidden since time immemorial.
